titles.title: Families of Disabled Veterans Work Opportunity Act of 2009

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide the work opportunity tax credit with respect to a designated family member of a veteran with a service-connected disability if the veteran is unable to work.
Families of Disabled Veterans Work Opportunity Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Families of Disabled Veterans Work Opportunity Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a work opportunity tax credit for wages paid to a certified family member of a veteran with a service-connected disability who is unable to work.
